snippet.title: Citadel: Forged with Fire - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
This massive online sandbox RPG features elements of magic, spellcasting, building, exploring and crafting. Tame mighty beasts, forge alliances, explore uncharted territories or fight for dominance in Citadel: Forged with Fire!

Featuring music composed by the award-winning composer of "Ori and the Blind Forest" Gareth Coker!

Visit http://www.citadethegame.com/ to sign up for the Closed Beta!
Follow us on Twitter at http://www.twitter.com/PlayCitadel/
Like us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/PlayCitadelGame/
